ImprovementDescription.content:
Editor fields can depend on each other. That is, the value in one field can depend on the values in other fields - i.e., it changes when the value in the other field(s) change.

For example you can use this dependency to:

  • Place the copyright information of a picture into an editor field when loading the picture in another field.
  • Generate a drop-down list with the values of other fields
